name: Magcargo
flavorText:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

previous.name: Slugma
previous.flavorText:
It never sleeps.
It has to keep
moving because if it stopped, its
magma body would
cool and harden.

next.name: Swinub
next.flavorText:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.
